igraphlite 0.10.17
  • Reference

Common parameters used throughout the package

Source: R/utils.R
common_params.Rd

This function does nothing. It is designed to be used with @inheritParams.

Usage

common_params(
  graph,
  vids,
  vid,
  from,
  to,
  eids,
  eid,
  edges,
  mode,
  weights,
  directed,
  loops,
  multiple
)

Arguments

graph

An igraph_ptr object.

vids

An integer vector of vertex IDs.

vid

An integer value of vertex ID.

from

An integer vector of vertex IDs.

to

An integer vector of vertex IDs.

eids

An integer vector of edge IDs.

eid

An integer value of edge ID.

edges

An integer vector of vertex IDs; the first two elements are the first edge, etc.

mode

An integer value of edge type to count; {1: OUT, 2: IN, 3: ALL}.

weights

A numeric vector of edge weights; TRUE to use Eattr(graph, "weight").

directed

A logical value, whether to consider directed paths. Ignored for undirected graphs.

loops

An integer value, how to treat loop edges; {0: NO_LOOPS, 1: LOOPS/LOOPS_TWICE, 2: LOOPS_ONCE}

multiple

A logical value, whether to keep multiple (parallel) edges.
